zh.bdwidth_title_name_tip1: 1. 网络带宽是EOS网络中的资源，需要抵押EOS以获取.
zh.bdwidth_title_name_tip2: 2. 您可以赎回抵押的EOS，赎回的资产将在72小时后返回您的账户.

en.bdwidth_title_name_tip1: 1. You have to stake EOS in case to acquire the resources.
en.bdwidth_title_name_tip2: 2. You can retrieve your stake anytime you want, the refund will arrive around 72 hours.
